title: WhatsApp Contact Us - Button & Widget
shortDescription: Let website visitors contact you directly on WhatsApp
longDescription:
The WhatsApp Contact plugin will assist you in making your website more user friendly. Let your users contact you directly on world's #1 messaging app WhatsApp from friendly widgets and buttons.

Main Features:    
ðŸ’¯ 100% Free to use.

ðŸ”Œ Easy two-click installation without having to signup or pay.

![Contact widget plugin demo](https://collectcdn.com/assets/cloudflare/whatsapp-example.png)

Check out https://collect.chat if you need a 100% automated chatbot for your website for lead generation & data collection.
